title: Why it Feels like the World is Coming Unglued and What Can Help
description:
As a pastor I'm watching people's anxiety levels rise. Covid, protests, iconoclasm. As people get more anxious they make poorer decisions. What goes into our perceptions of the world. The Rebel Wisdom calls this "sense making". I spend some time with this and talk about how I cope. 

Rebel Wisdom Sense Making https://youtu.be/VkKnOEQlwl4
David Fuller Jordan Peterson Journey https://youtu.be/NXpWIephX1o
Benjamin Boyce John Vervaeke https://youtu.be/CBuPbplRZFQ
Why Racism is Natural and what to do about it https://youtu.be/YXrratv5omE
Coddling of the American Mind https://amzn.to/2NnUVkn
Bret Weinstein John McWhorter https://youtu.be/Y-FOCZVLTaw
Rafe Kelley and I https://youtu.be/OCZM18dRCf0
Rafe Kelley and John Vervaeke https://youtu.be/EbNxuzDbEQI
Protestants vs Reason https://youtu.be/SyLm7OHaOaw
https://threadreaderapp.com/thread/1274376329748598785.html
https://threadreaderapp.com/thread/1274883964402929664.html
